name: Crossing (Michael Kirby)
description:
Demo 

Crossing inspired by Frogger or Crossy Roads, made for a university project. Hoping to continue to work on it and further develop the project.

As a fox you are in search for a new home, as you go on a journey you see the landscape change and face new hazards along the way.

Keyboard Controls :

  • W,A,S,D keys to move.
  • Spacebar key to jump.
  • Esc key to pause.

Keyboard Controls :

  • Use left analog stick to move. 
  • Press A button to jump.
  • Start button to pause.

Note: Currently the Fox and Dogs do not have any animations, this is in the works at the moment. All sound effects and music are royalty free and the creators have been credited in game.
